title: Bot Accounts
body:
TL;DR Bot accounts are very annoying, I'm hoping someone from riot will see this and try to fix this issue with the report system.

Ok so here's the thing, some of us have terrible internet and can't play norms much because of ping spikes etc. That's not the point, what is the point is literally every game now I play of intermediate bots there will be at least one bot account on my team. For those of you who don't know what that is it's just simply someone who made an account and downloaded third party bot software to play for them and level them up so they can sell or use the accounts for whatever. What I am saying is this needs to be solved, I always report them under intentionally feeding and cheating then type "is a bot account" I just really hope riot is actually doing something to stop these accounts because they are damn annoying. I am basically only typing this because in the game I just played of intermediate bots my entire team were bots which is a bit messed up in my opinion.


Thanks for reading, sincerely, Penguin on Crack

replies.body: They definitely ban bots when they find them, but they simply are hard to catch sometimes. You're doing the right thing with your report, but if you feel the need you can also submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
